title: This budget Lenovo laptop I tested has no business being this good for the price
description: Lenovo's IdeaPad 5i offers a lot of value for its price point, though it may not be for everyone.
content:
Follow ZDNET: Add us as a preferred source on Google.
When shopping for a 2-in-1 laptop, you have to weigh multiple characteristics: versatility, performance, and price. The Lenovo IdeaPad 5i is one… [+6623 chars]
